name: bee kind washcloth
notes:
the world needs more kindness. with that goal in mind, i am making this a free pattern. i would appreciate your linking your project to the pattern if you use it so that i can watch the  kindness spread.

this was originally designed for the september  2024 mkal for the [mystery 220 (more or less)](/groups/mystery-220-more-or-less) group. the final version is slightly different from the version used for the mystery knit. 

the pattern can be used to knit  a washcloth, table topper or blanket square. size and the amount of yarn will vary, depending on yarn used.
